Package dao.services.interfaces

Interface AccountService<T extends Account>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AccountRepository<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccountServiceImpl, CheckingAccountServiceImpl, SavingAccountServiceImpl
    public interface AccountService<T extends Account>
extends AccountRepository<T>
    The interface provides a contract between classes on how want interact with the table "account". This GRUD interfaces for Account control from the database. His extended AccountRepository Generic must be extended Account.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ruslan Pipan

    • Method Detail

      • removeAccount

        boolean removeAccount​(T account)
        This method removed account in database.
        Parameters:
        account - its generic type extended Account, the account which will be passed in parameters to be deleted in database, and the link will be lost.
        Returns:
        true if the account was successfully removed from the database, else false.

      • addAccount

        boolean addAccount​(T account)
            throws DontInitialisation
        Method added account in database.
        Parameters:
        account - its generic type extended Account, the account which will be passed in parameters will check the correctness of th data, and encrypted is written to the database.
        Returns:
        true if the account will be added to the database, else false.
        Throws:
        DontInitialisation

      • transaction

        boolean transaction​(T accountFrom,
                    T accountTo,
                    double awt)
        The method to provides transaction.
        Parameters:
        accountFrom - the account from which withdraw money.
        accountTo - the account to which the money comes.
        awt - amount of money.
        Returns:
        true if the transaction will be successful, else false.

      • updateBalance

        boolean updateBalance​(T account)
        The method provides an update balance account.
        Parameters:
        account - its generic type extended Account, the account which passed in parameters will be updated balance in object and in the database.
        Returns:
        true if the update was successful, else false.
